segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit the identifying number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate dates and times for the entire message including the date and time of the preparation of the message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify references relating to the message and related dates and times.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference which applies to the entire message, e.g. the reference to a previous message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate dates and times relating to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify a party for the entire message including the message sender and related contacts.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify the name/address of the party and to identify the party role.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify communication numbers or email addresses for a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments containing information about an individual piece of transport equipment.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to identify the transport equipment.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference to the transport equipment.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a place or a location related to the transport equipment.

segment.name: Seal number
segment.documentation: SEL, A segment to specify a seal number.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to specify the gross mass of transport equipment and date/time when it was determined.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify the gross mass (gross weight) of the transport equipment and to give the indication of whether the gross mass has been verified, e.g. according to SOLAS regulations.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time when the gross mass was determined.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments identifying the means of transport and related details for the transport movement.

segment.name: Transport information
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to specify information regarding the transport such as mode of transport, means of transport, its conveyance reference number and the identification of the means of transport.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference relating to the transport, such as an additional voyage reference number.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments providing information about documentation related to the gross mass verification.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to specify the type and identification of documentation.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time related to the documentation.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to qualify and specify name and address information related to the documentation.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify the function and name/address of an organization or individual.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify a contact and related communication information.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to specify the function and details of a contact person or department.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify communication numbers or email addresses for a person or department to whom a communication should be directed.
